title: Modern Townhouse - 3 bed 2 bath in Northern Liberties
description:
Beautiful Spacious FRESHLY PAINTED Townhome with 3 beds and 2 baths is the perfect home in the high demand area of Northern Liberties for you to call home. This gem is located in the heart of the Olde Kensington neighborhood of Philadelphia on a tree lined block surrounded by new upscale construction, trendy coffee shops and numerous dining options. This property boasts 3 large bedrooms, with a primary that encompasses the entire 3rd floor with en suite bathroom. A laundry room is conveniently located on the second floor and not to mention the green backyard, stainless steel appliances, and wood floors. Basement is an unfinished clean space, perfect for storage. You won't want to wait to see this one!
Renter is responsible for all utilities. Pets require approval, and also yield pet deposits. This is a non-smoking townhome. Preference is a multi-year lease, but will approve an annual lease for the right tenant. We require double security, and first month's rent to move-in.

title: Brilliant Old City true loft with fabulous light and views
description: Brilliant Old City true loft with fabulous light and views, open space, coveted top floor location (no upstairs neighbors!) and deeded parking immediately outside your door (one of only 3 spaces in the entire building). Original details including voluminous beamed ceilings, gleaming hardwoods, and tall south and east facing windows with captivating city views. Open plan Viking kitchen with upgraded commercial appliances, stone counters, and a breakfast bar for additional seating. Spacious walk in closet area with laundry for storage, and modern full bath with subway tile surround. Sellers preferred the open loft bedroom layout for use as their pied a terre, but an enclosed bedroom and dressing room may be built adjacent to the bathroom-ask for details. Plenty of space for bookcases, desk, and home office here as well. AC, basement storage, and a shared roof deck with panoramic views of bridge & city. Tons of Old City charm and character, with a stellar location north of Market. Steps from restaurants, boutiques, coffee shops, gyms, & galleries. Quick access to transit, highways, and airport.

title: Adorable 1 bed 1 bath apt close to campus! A must see!
description:
401 N 33rd St 3R- ROOMY 1 bed 1 bath apt. H/W floors and MORE!
Located in the heart of Powelton Village, live in an awesome apartment building very close to Drexel and UPenn making it a short walk to class and all the University City has to offer. Close to a large number of restaurants, coffee shops and grocery stores such as the Fresh Grocer, Trader Joes, ShopRite and the newly built Whole Foods. description:

Hardwood floors throughout the apt with radiator heat. Separate living room. The two bedrooms are connected by a door, but they are both individually accessible too. Right off South St which makes for an easy walk to Old City, Italian Market, and Center City.
1 year lease required.

title: 1br - Beautiful Bright Pet Friendly 1-Bedroom!
description:
I'm sad to say I'll be needing to move and am looking for someone to takeover the lease (currently signed until July 2023) for my apartment! I have loved living here and am excited to pass it along to someone who will appreciate it as much as I have.
You may have seen my earlier post for a July/August move-out-- my transition has been unpredictable and I wasn't able to move out then but I definitely need someone now!
Here are the specs:
- One bedroom
- available for a August 15th or (preferable) September 1 move-in
- $1100 per month + gas for cooking and heat + electric
- easy and abundant street parking *without a permit*
- pet friendly (I believe I pay a monthly pet fee for my cat and dog so rent may actually be slightly cheaper if you have no pets-- would need to be discussed with the landlord directly)
- has a tub! Maybe you think it's silly to include this but tubs are for some reason rare in one bedrooms here in West Philly so it's really a find
- shared yard & large front porch
- hardwood floors throughout
- great natural light with two large west facing windows that look out onto the backyard
- unit is second floor, rear, so it's quiet as it's removed up off of the street
- easy transit access to both the 34 and 13 trollies, as well as several buses
- my neighbors are really amazing-- both in the building and in the adjacent ones. It's really a sweet block
The bedroom easily fits a queen or king bed. Right now we have a queen bed, very large dresser, book shelf, and two arm chairs in it. There are two closets in the bedroom, one the size of a typical non-walk-in closet, the other much larger with storage space above and behind where clothes would hang.
The living room and kitchen are open into one another as shown in pictures, but large enough for a table and eating area plus a designated living room space with couches and chairs. We also have a "landing nook" with some storage set up and room for shoes and coats just inside of the front door.
Bathroom has a tub and great shower pressure, as well as a large frosted window so it also gets lovely natural light.
This space is great for a single person with pets or a couple.
Email me for more photos, a video walk through, or to stop by and view in person. Please, serious inquiries only!

title: Renovated Studio Apartment Home with Wood Floors, Package Room, Lounge
description:
The studio apartment home at 2411 is available for lease at this moment! This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home on the 24th floor features large windows that face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. This renovated kitchen features white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. This home has wood floors. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as August 26, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, or Di Bruno Bros. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Madewell, and Paper Source. Experience fine dining at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, or Pietro's. Savor a coffee at La Colombe or Ultimo. Have a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at Van Leeuwen. Stroll across the park and then buy a baguette at Metropolitan Bakery. Grab scones from The Bakeshop on 20th. Catch a show at the Walnut Street Theatre. Wander around the Rodin Museum. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday. There is so much to do in this area!
Community Amenities:
* Package lockers
* 8,000 square foot resident lounge with free wifi
* Top-of-the-line fitness center with park view
* Sauna
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Bike storage
* Amazing roof deck with fantastic views
* Nightly guest suites for the family and friends of current residents
* Elevator building with 24/7 front door attendant and concierge desk staff
* 24/7 maintenance
* Laundry room on every floor
* Larger laundry facility on the 3rd floor
* Attached valet parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
Apartment Home Features:
* Studio apartment home on 24th floor
* Dishwasher
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Disposal
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen countertops
* Wood floor
* Large south-facing windows
* View of Chancellor Street
* All utilities included (except cable and internet)
Wondering if this home is still available? Visit our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com to check if 2411 is still listed under the Dali floor plan! description:
The home at 2402 is a 1,180 square foot Da Vinci two bedroom two bathroom apartment home in a building located on Rittenhouse Square! This home on the 24th floor has windows that face east for morning sunshine and afternoon shade and have a city view. The beautiful kitchen and bathrooms are definitely a must see! There is also abundant closet space for plenty of storage. Experience the convenience of having a combination washer and dryer inside your new home! Move into your new home as early as September 1, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to stores and restaurants! Target, Giant, Trader Joe's, Sue's Produce Market, Rittenhouse Market, Spruce Food Market, and Di Bruno Bros. are grocery stores within walking distance! Shop at the retail stores of Rittenhouse Row such as Barnes & Noble, Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Madewell, Paper Source, L'Occitane, Boyds, Banana Republic Factory, Sephora, and Nordstrom Rack. Nearby dining options include: Rouge, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's Coal Oven Pizzeria, Devon Seafood Grill, a.bar, a.kitchen, Spice Finch, Via Locusta, The Love, Marathon Grill, Gran Caffe L'Aquila, and Alice Pizza. Sip a delicious coffee at La Colombe, Ultimo, Elixr, and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in a beautiful French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Stroll across the park and then buy a loaf of artisanal bread from Metropolitan Bakery.
